desc: Alvy is a curation of high quality and comfortable clothing you'll want to live in, and accessories that will be favorites for YEARS. Above all, we want you to look and feel fantastic during your busy day. And feel good about your purchase. Alvy's focus is ethical production, Fair Trade practices, and American made.

layout.text: fair trade, ethical & made in the usa clothing + accessories

Ours is a curation of Fair Trade + USA made for the woman seeking a well-loved closet. Our focus is high quality, comfortable, and gorgeous pieces that will be your favorite for years to come!
Look good, feel good and shop your values!
